message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $85?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $85 is a bit too low for me.  Would you consider $90? It's a great deal for a product you'll value at $100.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87? I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
